Purpose: To accurately and precisely measure total and free thyroxine (T4) levels in serum using immunoassay methods.
Container: Red Top Tube (RTT) without anticoagulants or preservatives
Equipment: Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Roche Cobas e411 or Beckman Coulter Access), centrifuge, refrigerator (2-8°C), freezer (-20°C)
